parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the power steering hose can cause the vehicle to catch fire, resulting in damage to the vehicle and potential harm to the occupants.
symptoms: Smoke or fire coming from under the hood

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ball joint can cause the wheel to break off, resulting in loss of control of the vehicle and potential accidents.
symptoms: the ball joint snapping in half

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the steering system can cause the vehicle to be difficult to steer, resulting in loss of control of the vehicle and potential accidents.
symptoms: the steering wheel becoming hard to turn
and the vehicle being difficult to maneuver.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the electrical system can cause the vehicle to catch fire, resulting in damage to the vehicle and potential harm to the occupants.
symptoms: Smoke or fire coming from under the hood

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the manufacturer to properly repair recalled vehicles can cause the vehicle to catch fire or experience other safety issues, resulting in damage to the vehicle and potential harm to the occupants.
symptoms: lack of communication from the manufacturer
and the vehicle experiencing safety issues after repair.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brake system can cause the vehicle to lose stopping power, leading to accidents, injuries, and fatalities.
symptoms: Squealing or grinding noises when applying the brakes
brake pedal feels soft or spongy
brake pedal sticks to the floor
and smoke or burning smell from the wheels.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Warped rotors and brake drums can cause vibration, pulling, and loss of pedal, leading to accidents and injuries.
symptoms: pulling to one side when braking
and warped or uneven brake rotors and drums.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Excessive brake noise and vibration can be a sign of a more serious underlying problem, leading to accidents and injuries.
symptoms: or humming noises when applying the brakes

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Brake Failure due to Material Defect
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Defective brake materials can cause the brakes to fail, leading to accidents and injuries.
symptoms: and brake pedal feels soft or spongy.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Failure of the ABS system can cause the vehicle to lose traction and stability, leading to accidents and injuries.
The failure of the electrical system can cause fires, which can lead to accidents, injuries, or fatalities.
symptoms: White smoke coming from under the hood
flames erupting from the engine compartment
power mirrors moving on their own
smoke coming from the door panel
and flames shooting out of the door panel.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the BCM can cause various safety issues, such as the loss of essential functions, including windshield wipers, dash gauges, security system, and transmission gear indicator.
symptoms: and air conditioner not blowing cold air.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Heating and Air Conditioning System Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the heating and air conditioning system can cause discomfort and distraction while driving, which can lead to accidents.
symptoms: air conditioner not blowing cold air
blower motor only working on high
